name: Bass Fishing 3D II
description:
The second bass fishing game that exceeded 14 million DL!

Experience the bass fishing with beautiful and overwhelmingly evolved 3D graphics from previous app!!
Bass Fishing has become more exciting by adding underwater camera, easy lure actions, and competing with NPCs.

*Bass Fishing in extremely beautiful 3D fishing field
You can enjoy fishing that's overwhelmingly & beautifully evolved 3D fields.
Even beginners can easily find a bass by using sonar!

*Underwater Camera!
It's now possible to check the underwater situation with an underwater camera!
Choose the lure that matches the depth where fishes are hiding!

*Upgraded lure action
Lure action can be easily performed with action buttons!
Appeal big bass with several kinds of lure actions in each lures!

*Fight system reborn
Combined the intuitive operation using button during rampaging fight!
Operate the rod intuitively according to the movement of bass.
And keep reeling the reel at the best timing!

*Compete against rivals
Rival will appears on the field. And you can enjoy the showdown against them!
They will search & catches the fishes too!
Discover fishing spots and fish big bass before them!

*Fulfilling game modes
In "Tournaments", top rankers from all over the world will appear as your rival.
And you can compete against them!
"Missions" includes 2x the amount of the previous app!
In "Free Fishing", it's now possible to set "rain" and "water temperature" too!

*Recommend Device
iOS: 8 or later
Memory: 1GB or more
